ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: your Lord's punishment will certainly take place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The punishment of your Lord is certain to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: verily your Lord's chastisement shall come to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the torment of your Lord will inevitably take place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your Lord’s punishment will surely take place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the torment of your Lord will surely come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely the punishment of your Lord will come to pass;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely thy Lord's chastisement is about to fall;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the doom of thy Lord will surely come to pass;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the punishment of your Lord shall certainly come to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the torment of thine Lord is sure to befalls
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: indeed your Lord’s punishment will surely befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, the Doom of thy Lord will indeed come to pass;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Torment of your Lord will surely come to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: surely, the punishment of your Lord is about to come,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The punishment of your Lord is coming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:7] lo! your Lord’s chastisement will assuredly take place, it will assuredly come down on those who deserve it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the doom of thy Lord) on the Day of Judgement (will surely come to pass) will surely take place in relation to Quraysh;
